damage_resistances.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abishai makes one Bite attack and two Scimitar attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Creeping Darkness {@recharge}
headerEntries: The abishai casts {@spell darkness} at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no spell components or {@status concentration}. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.
